/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with traditional Chinese buildings, characterized by their curved roofs and ornate details. These buildings, painted in a variety of colors, add a vibrant touch to the otherwise muted palette of the image. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. In the distance, the silhouette of mountains can be seen, adding depth and a sense of vastness to the landscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
